div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 621 Dobralevo, c. 50 km. N of Vraca, Bul- garia, 1960 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: "many" AR. Pot hoard Thasos: spread-flan tetradr. incl. some imit. Disposition: Vraca 6, of which 4 imit. Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 258
